news.title: Previously unseen images of Epstein's island released
news.summary: The new images come as a deadline for the broader release of documents held by the US government looms.

news.title: Investigation into pre-Budget leaks is under way, MPs told
news.summary: Chancellor Rachel Reeves has given her "full support" to  a review of security processes around the lead-up to the Budget.

news.title: Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi
news.summary: BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India.

news.title: Eurovision faces crucial decision over Israel
news.summary: Organisers of the song contest meet in Geneva on Thursday to debate Israel's role in the event.

news.title: Buying time or enough to save his job? Farke hails 'great' Leeds win
news.summary: In the relegation zone and under increasing pressure, Leeds' win over Chelsea was a "huge result" for Daniel Farke.

news.title: A shadow of his imperious self - Van Dijk fights decline
news.summary: Virgil van Dijk must not be written off - but he looks a shadow of his usual imperious self, writes Phil McNulty.

news.title: Did we get too excited, too soon about Hearts?
news.summary: Hearts' eight-point lead at the top of the Scottish Premiership has evaporated. So what has happened?
